== IRC LoCo Classroom ==
Everything related to hosting sessions on IRC fortnightly (this might become more regular if interest grows) in either #ubuntu-mm.

=== Session Suggestions ===
All session suggestions are welcome (as long as they are reasonable) and should be suggested via the Mailing List or on the IRC channels. Suggestions regarding end-users, developing for ubuntu, servers, etc, are all welcome.

Some suggestions so far:

* Introduction to bug triaging
* Launchpad translation
* Data recovery techniques using ubuntu livecd environment
